type: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) for TEMPORARY HELP SERVICES (THS)
department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
short_summary: SIS urgently requires up to ten Senior Computer Application Support resources
description: The SIS division provides IM/IT support to approximately 4500 clients within the National Capital Region. Due to an increase in IM/IT requirements and support, the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development SIS division urgently requires the services of up to ten Senior Computer Application Support resources. The scope of work includes Microsoft Windows upgrades, smartphone upgrades, Movement of staff, IM/IT Resource Center resources within the National Capital Region.
tags: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
full_summary:
=================================================
### Notice of Proposed Procurement for Temporary Help Services

#### Solicitation Reference

* Solicitation Number: 24-259545
* Amendment Number: 1
* Reference Number: cb-219-12960178

#### Procurement Details

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-15 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* UNSPSC Code: 80111600 (Temporary Personnel Services)

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
* Address: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0G4, Canada

#### Contract Description

The Service Delivery and Support division (SIS) of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development requires the services of up to ten Senior Computer Application Support resources to assist with the following tasks:

* IT support for approximately 4500 clients within the National Capital Region
* Microsoft Windows upgrades
* Smartphone upgrades
* IM/IT Resource Center resources

#### Tender Requirements

* The contracting entity is looking for resources with expertise in Microsoft Windows, smartphone upgrades, and IM/IT resource center support
* The resources will be required to work on-site in the National Capital Region
* The resources will be required to provide technical support for approximately 4500 clients

#### Contact

* Trent Clemenhagen
* Email: trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 203-1308

#### Attachments

* Tender Notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33691/npp-apm-24-259545.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33691/npp-apm-24-259545.pdf) [FR] [EN]




Note that the contact information, as well as the attachments, are correct and in the same format as provided by the contractor. However, please keep in mind that not all the technical terms and phrases might be correctly translated.
